languages.text: "Во время гадания, что открыло мне измену Адальберта, мой транс был нарушен. Мысли, что прежде устремлялись к единой точке, сбились с начертанного пути. Я сошла со стези". {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. В нем — смятение.{/n} "Мои мысли потревожил{mf||а} ты".

traits.locale_text: "Во время ритуала выхода на цель мой транс был нарушен. Мысли, что прежде были устремлены к единой точке, сбились с предначертанного пути. Я сошла со стези. Я..." {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. В нем — смятение.{/n} "Мои мысли потревожил{mf||а} ты".

languages.text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."
languages.original_text: "Во время гадания, что открыло мне измену Адальберта, мой транс был нарушен. Мысли, что прежде устремлялись к единой точке, сбились с начертанного пути. Я сошла со стези". {n}Она поднимает на вас взгляд. В нем — смятение.{/n} "Мои мысли потревожил{mf||а} ты".

traits.locale_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging in a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path. I lost my way." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... was thoughts of you."

Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

"During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

languages.text: "Während der Prophetie, die mir Adalberts Verrat offenbart hat, wurde meine Trance unterbrochen. Anstatt sich auf einen einzigen Punkt zu fokussieren, wurden meine Gedanken vom vorgesehenen Weg abgedrängt, und ich verlor meinen Faden." {n}Sie blickt dich mit gepeinigten Augen an.{/n}"Was mich abgelenkt hat ... waren Gedanken an Euch."
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

traits.locale_text: "Während der Prophetie, die mir Adalberts Verrat offenbart hat, wurde meine Trance unterbrochen. Anstatt sich auf einen einzigen Punkt zu fokussieren, wurden meine Gedanken vom vorgesehenen Weg abgedrängt, und ich verlor meinen Faden." Sie blickt dich mit gepeinigten Augen an.{/n}"Was mich abgelenkt hat ... waren Gedanken an Euch."

languages.text: «Durante la adivinación que me reveló la traición de Adalbert, mi trance se interrumpió. En lugar de converger en un mismo punto, mis pensamientos se salieron del camino y perdí el hilo». {n}Levanta la mirada hasta tus ojos, afligida.{/n} «Lo que me distrajeron... fueron pensamientos sobre usted».
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

traits.locale_text: «Durante la adivinación que me reveló la traición de Adalbert, mi trance se interrumpió. En lugar de converger en un mismo punto, mis pensamientos se salieron del camino y perdí el hilo». {n}Levanta la mirada hasta tus ojos, afligida.{/n} «Lo que me distrajeron... fueron pensamientos sobre usted».

languages.text: 「アダルバートの裏切りを明らかにするディビネーションの最中、私のトランス状態に邪魔が入ったの。私の思考は一点に収束する代わりに、意図していた糸から外れてしまった」{n}彼女は苦痛に満ちた目であなたを見上げてくる。{/n}「私の意識が反れてしまったのは…あなたのことを考えてしまったからだった」
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

traits.locale_text: 「アダルバートの裏切りを明らかにするディビネーションの最中、私のトランス状態に邪魔が入ったの。私の思考は一点に収束する代わりに、意図していた糸から外れてしまった」{n}彼女は苦痛に満ちた目であなたを見上げてくる。{/n}「私の意識が反れてしまったのは…あなたのことを考えてしまったからだった」

languages.text: “我之前试图通过占卜，揭露了阿达伯特的背叛。然而，在占卜的过程中，我的恍惚状态被打断了。我的思想并没有集中在一个点上，而是偏离了原本的丝线，我也迷失了方向。”{n}她抬起头，看着你，眼神中充满了痛苦。{/n}“让我分心的……是我对你的思念。”
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

traits.locale_text: “我之前试图通过占卜，揭露了阿达伯特的背叛。然而，在占卜的过程中，我的恍惚状态被打断了。我的思想并没有集中在一个点上，而是偏离了原本的丝线，我也迷失了方向。”{n}她抬起头，看着你，眼神中充满了痛苦。{/n}“让我分心的……是我对你的思念。”

languages.text: « Au cours de la divination qui m'a révélé la trahison d'Adalbert, ma transe a été interrompue. Au lieu de converger vers un seul point, mes pensées ont été détournées du droit chemin et j'ai perdu mon fil. » {n}Elle lève vers vous un regard empli de détresse.{/n} « J'ai été distraite... en pensant à vous. »
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."

traits.locale_text: « Au cours de la divination qui m'a révélé la trahison d'Adalbert, ma transe a été interrompue. Au lieu de converger vers un seul point, mes pensées ont été détournées du droit chemin et j'ai perdu mon fil. » {n}Elle lève vers vous un regard empli de détresse.{/n} « J'ai été distraite... en pensant à vous. »

languages.text: "Adalbert'in bana ihanet edeceğini gördüğüm kehanet esnasında transım sekteye uğradı. Düşüncelerim, tek bir noktada birleşmek yerine hedeflediğim yoldan çıktı. Sonucunda ipliğimi kaybettim." {n}Gözlerinde endişeli bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Dikkatimi dağıtan şey... Sana dair düşünceler oldu."
languages.original_text: "During the divination that revealed Adalbert's betrayal to me, my trance was interrupted. Instead of converging on a single point, my thoughts were thrown off the intended path, and I lost my thread." {n}She looks up at you with distress in her eyes.{/n} "What distracted me... were thoughts of you."
